title: Wrapping Cloth (pojaggi), ca. 1900
creditline: Museum purchase from Roy and Niuta Titus Foundation Fund
description: A multi-color patchwork of silk squares, rectangles and triangles in blues, greens, yellows, oranges, pinks and white. The design gives the appearance of radiating out from the center, with the smallest pieces in the center and growing slightly larger with each concentric square. Off-white lining.

tombstone.epitaph:
Wrapping Cloth (pojaggi), ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Medium: silk
Technique: sewn pieced-work. Museum purchase from Roy and Niuta Titus Foundation Fund. 1994-22-2.
